definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Dear colleagues, a pleasant journey, I remember thinking of us, always come back together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的同事，一路順風，記得想念我們，常回來聚聚。

sentences.english: May you have favorable winds on the way.
I wish you a safe journey.
These are cars which show you've arrived and had a good time along the way.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的車可以顯示你已功成名就，並且一路順風順水。

sentences.english: I hope you'll have a very pleasant journey.
sentences.chinese: 祝你一路順風旅途快活。

sentences.english: My honey, i wish you a pleasant journey , and please take care.
sentences.chinese: 我親愛的，祝你一路順風，請多多保重。

sentences.english: Goodbye and have a good flight.
This is from Nick and Sue. They send their best wishes.
sentences.chinese: 這個是尼克和蘇給你的，他們也祝你一路順風。

sentences.english: The priest blessed the ship before it left port.
sentences.chinese: 牧師祈禱上帝保佑那艘船一路順風。

definition: to escape from the abyss of suffering/to shed off a wretched plight
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
the first stick of incense placed in the censer (believed to bring good luck esp. during festivities)/(slang) (Tw) the first reply to a blog post etc
restrain your grief, accept fate (condolence phrase)
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
lit. dress up as God, play the devil (idiom); fig. to mystify/to deceive people/to scam
see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
